name: Verify Program , Market Segment and Entity ID columns are shown in all reports for Policy Overview Renewals

testSteps.description: 1: Verify Program , Market Segment and Entity ID columns are shown in all reports for Policy Overview Renewals ({Reports=Upcoming Renewals})

children.description: Given underwriter is on home page of PAS
And select Reports 'Upcoming Renewals' from Renewals

Then below columns should be visible in the Policy Overview report screen
| Program |
| Market Segment |
| Entity ID |

testSteps.description: 2: Verify Program , Market Segment and Entity ID columns are shown in all reports for Policy Overview Renewals ({Reports=Renewals In Progress})

children.description: Given underwriter is on home page of PAS
And select Reports 'Renewals In Progress' from Renewals

Then below columns should be visible in the Policy Overview report screen
| Program |
| Market Segment |
| Entity ID |

testSteps.description: 3: Verify Program , Market Segment and Entity ID columns are shown in all reports for Policy Overview Renewals ({Reports=Non Renewals})

children.description: Given underwriter is on home page of PAS
And select Reports 'Non Renewals' from Renewals

Then below columns should be visible in the Policy Overview report screen
| Program |
| Market Segment |
| Entity ID |

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given underwriter is on home page of PAS
And user Navigates to Reports
And select Renewals 'Renewals' from Reports
And select Reports '<Reports>' from Renewals
Then below columns should be visible in the Policy Overview report screen
